name: A little Story
description:
This game is about a story seen through a friend's eyes
In the turmoil of events, you are sometimes what keeps them alive, just by being present.
Protecting them sometime means protecting what should be precious to them.
And that's what you'll do, here, for their sake...

***

Controls

Protect the crystals by shooting the enemy's projections. Once you've taken down enough of them, you'll damage your opponent.

Just click on the screen and you'll start shooting in that direction, no other control is needed. 

tip : just keep clicking/touching the screen to continuously shoot!

Credits

This game has been developed in 10 days as a little challenge by two friends.
All graphics, sounds and music have been created from scratch.
